trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous operation to open a stream for reading from the blob.
trans-unit.target: Initiates an asynchronous operation to open a stream for reading from the blob.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.Stream</codeEntityReference> that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.Stream</codeEntityReference> that represents the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: On the <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.Stream</codeEntityReference> object returned by this method, the <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)</codeEntityReference> method must be called exactly once for every <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)</codeEntityReference> call.
trans-unit.target: On the <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.Stream</codeEntityReference> object returned by this method, the <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)</codeEntityReference> method must be called exactly once for every <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)</codeEntityReference> call.

trans-unit.source: Failing to end the read process before beginning another read process can cause unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: Failing to end the read process before beginning another read process can cause unexpected behavior.

trans-unit.source: Note that this method always makes a call to the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlockBlob.FetchAttributesAsync(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)</codeEntityReference> method under the covers.
trans-unit.target: Note that this method always makes a call to the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlockBlob.FetchAttributesAsync(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)</codeEntityReference> method under the covers.

trans-unit.source: Set the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlockBlob.StreamMinimumReadSizeInBytes</codeEntityReference> property before calling this method to specify the minimum number of bytes to buffer when reading from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Set the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlockBlob.StreamMinimumReadSizeInBytes</codeEntityReference> property before calling this method to specify the minimum number of bytes to buffer when reading from the stream.

trans-unit.source: The value must be at least 16 KB.
trans-unit.target: The value must be at least 16 KB.
